overview: Hot chicks in military outfits are what you will find when you check out Ello Ello Volume 2 from Bluebird Films. Picking up where the wildly popular Ello Ello Volume 1 leaves off, this campy hardcore film brings you the same amount of anal, group and one-on-one sex that made the first installment so incredibly popular. High production values and hot babes in uniform await you as you check out this fantastic series.
title: Ello Ello 2
